productName: HL-L3280CDW Colour Laser LED Duplex WIFI Printer with Gigabit Ethernet Brother HL-L3280CDW Colour Laser LED Duplex WIFI Printer With Gigabit Ethernet Connectivity, Ideal For Home And Small Office
description:
A4 print speed up to 26 ppm (Colour/Black)
USB 2.0, LAN, Gigabit Ethernet, WiFi (Dual Band), WiFi Direct, AirPrint, Mopria, Brother iPrint&Scan
Auto 2-sided (Duplex) printing, Intuitive Buttons, 2.7 Inch TFT colour LCD Display, 256 MB Memory, 250 Sheets Paper Tray
Full capacity toner included. Yield up to 1000/1000 pages (black/colour)*
Compatible Brother Apps - BRAdmin Light, BRAdmin Pro4 : Windows App (By Download), Web Based Management
1 Year on-site warranty included
